original_text: But they understood not this saying, and it was hid from them, that they perceived it not: and they feared to ask him of that saying.
korean_text: 그들이 이 말씀을 알지 못하니 이는 그들로 깨닫지 못하게 숨긴 바 되었음이라 또 그들은 이 말씀을 묻기도 두려워하더라

sentences.original_text: But they understood not this saying
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 이 말씀을 이해하지 못하였고

sentences.original_text: and it was hid from them
and they feared to ask him
